participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Emily often reflects on her experiences and feelings.
participant_1.background: Emily grew up near the coast but never learned to swim, leading to her mixed feelings about the sea.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, Jake enjoys physical activities and loves the ocean.
participant_2.background: Jake has been swimming since childhood and finds joy in exploring the sea and its wonders.

content.text: I'm not a good swimmer at all.
What do you think about sea?
